ygData.subject: Escape from the fireball!
ygData.msgSnippet: (This could be an interesting storyline coming up. Drillbit, Atma and Starscream all want KitKat. All out war in Pred ranks.) Starscream, still carrying

(This could be an interesting storyline coming up. Drillbit, Atma and 
Starscream all want KitKat. All out war in Pred ranks.)

Starscream, still carrying Phobia, went around the debris. The heat 
was getting intense, the flames getting larger and the ship nearing a 
crash that would kill any onboard.

Computer:"Heat Overload Iminant. Reverting to stasis lock..

"Delay that! Put all weapons power towards Heat Tolerence.

Computer:"Transfering.......Crisis averted."

Finaly Starscream made it to the escape hatch. He put Phobia down and 
went to Jet Mode. He than asked forgiveness.

"Sorry to scare you for this, Phobia, but it's the only way."

Starscream than nudged Phobia out of the ship and sent her falling he 
immediatly dove after him, got under, opened the cockpit and let him 
fall in. He closed it.

"There we are. All safe and sound."

Starscream didn't know how wrong he was. Just as the was about to go 
and join the others, The ship hit the ground, causing what was eft of 
the cargo and fuel to explode in a vicious fury. Starscream, with 
Phobia inside him, was still very close to the blast. Most of his 
armor was incinerated, and he was thrown against a stone wall into 
stasis lock. Before he went it was his only hope that the cockpit had 
protected Phobia enough to give a help signal, or the Preds would 
think they died in the blast.
______________________________________________________________________
Gotron

Gotron headed back to the base on Zardus' orders.
